title: Do consumers buy into carbon claims? - Footprint
summary: Food and grocery brands have been quick to adopt carbon neutral claims, but interest has slowed as consumers and companies are left confused. There is a disconnect between the number of companies using carbon offsets and those with a net-zero strategy. Critics argue that carbon neutral claims are a shortcut to 'out-green' the competition and attract a premium price, and that many companies are using offsets as a quick fix rather than actually mapping out a strategy to become net-zero.
